channel.title: Banuser?

item.title: Banuser?
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

ok heres my code [code] if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mrslayer”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]
take what you want out of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Banuser?
item.dc:creator: @Danny068 Danny068
item.description:
@Danny068 wrote:

Ok the command that you type in to ban someone. ctrl + F and search that command in your client, you should get a code looking like this

} if(command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 1) { String victim = command.substring(8); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned"); appendToBanned(victim);
You see the && playerRights >= 1, change that number.

Read full topic

item.title: Banuser?
item.dc:creator: @Danny068 Danny068
item.description:
@Danny068 wrote:

Go into your client and search for banuser. Search using Ctrl+F. it should bring you to a code and as you’ll see it will say playerrights = 1. if you want only admins to be able to ban change this number to 2.

Change number to:

0=Normal Player
1=Mod
2=Admin
3=Owner

Should help

Read full topic
